title: Boards level...
body: how exactly do I rank up on the boards? I'm a level 11 in game, so I am unsure what to do in order to level up. I also am unable to comment.

replies.body:
You already did all you needed to do!  Now that you made a post on boards, your level on boards should now properly sync to what it is on League!

GLHF!

How do you rank up in membership? Also, if you are actually reading this, how can I catch the attention of reds with my posts? I have a lot of opinions concerning reworks and balancing that I believe would be beneficial for you guys to look at.
